sqlMap.select: select tuser.username, tperson.first_name, tperson.last_name, trole.name as role_name, trole.key as role_key, tuser.user_id from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id order by tuser.user_id desc

select tuser.username, tperson.first_name, tperson.last_name, trole.name as role_name, trole.key as role_key, tuser.user_id from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id left outer join tbl_contact_information as tcontact on tcontact.contact_information_id = tperson.contact_information_id where tcontact.email ilike #email# order by tuser.user_id desc
select count(tuser.user_id) from tbl_user as tuser

select count(user_id_distinct) as user_id_count from( select distinct (tuser.user_id) as user_id_distinct from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id where (tuser.username ilike #value# or tperson.first_name ilike #value# or tperson.last_name ilike #value# or tperson.first_name || ' ' || tperson.last_name ilike #value#) and trole.user_role_id in ( $otherValue$ ) order by tuser.user_id desc ) as user_id_count

select distinct tuser.user_id as user_id_distinct from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id where (tuser.username ilike #value# or tperson.first_name ilike #value# or tperson.last_name ilike #value# or tperson.first_name || ' ' || tperson.last_name ilike #value#) and trole.user_role_id in ( $otherValue$ ) order by tuser.user_id desc

select tuser.username, tperson.first_name, tperson.last_name, trole.name as role_name, trole.key as role_key, tuser.user_id from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id where tuser.user_id in ( select tuser.user_id from tbl_user as tuser left outer join tbl_person as tperson on tperson.person_id = tuser.person_id left outer join tbl_user_role as userrole on userrole.user_id = tuser.user_id left outer join tbl_user_role_reg as trole on trole.user_role_id = userrole.user_role_id where (tuser.username ilike #value# or tperson.first_name ilike #value# or tperson.last_name ilike #value# or tperson.first_name || ' ' || tperson.last_name ilike #value#) and trole.user_role_id in ( $otherValue$ ) and tuser.user_id <= #fromId# and tuser.user_id >= #toId# ) order by tuser.user_id desc
